ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(ISCHANGED( Quote__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Account__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Contact__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))), AND(ISCHANGED( Authorization_Contact__c ), NOT(ISBLANK( Id ))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: El campo no puede ser modificado.
